snippet: The administration of Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey portrayed David Wildstein as a loose cannon who was attacking the governor only in an effort to save himself.
abstract: Administration of New Jersey Gov Chris Christie strikes back hard and personally against former ally David Wildstein, who accused Christie of lying about how much he knew about lane closings at George Washington Bridge, scandal that has become the biggest crisis in Christie’s political career.

byline.contributor: Nate Schweber and Ashley Southall contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The administration of Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey portrayed David Wildstein as a loose cannon who was attacking the governor only in an effort to save himself.

headline.main: Chris Christie’s Office Targets Former Ally in a Memo
headline.print_headline: Christie’s Office Targets Former Ally in a Memo

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
